New Records: Dalton Knecht recorded a career-high 27 points.
Key Match Events: Dalton Knecht scored 16 points in the second half, including 10 points in the third quarter, leading a 29-15 third-quarter surge.
The Lakers turned the game around from trailing by 15 points to winning 104-99.
Post-Match Reflections: Dalton Knecht's performance is increasing his prospects of getting significant minutes in the lineup.
